subject: UPS Waybill Number: 1ZJ455510436401896 Exception Notification (ERN- Cana Cheng)
description_text:
Dear UPS Customer,

Thank you for using UPS service.

Below is an exception case for your company. Please follow up promptly to assist with customs clearance and delivery. If not handled properly by the deadline, all losses will be borne by the sender.

Tracking #	Ship From Address 	Ship To Address
Exception Reason + Possible Resolution	Deadline	
1ZJ455510436401896	 CN	 CA	 Due to fees incurred in the destination country (31.61 CAD) being refused by the consignee, delivery was unsuccessful. We need to contact the consignee for coordination. Please provide us with other valid contact numbers/emails for the consignee.	 Jan 27, 2026	


As international shipments require more processing time, please provide your instructions as soon as possible before 16:00 on the deadline date, so that we can inform the overseas team to follow up on the corresponding shipment. 

If we do not receive your valid instructions by the deadline, the package may be automatically returned or destroyed according to local operating procedures. Any related costs incurred will be borne by the sender.

Please note that goods cannot be transshipped from one country to another.

If you have any questions about this shipment, please reply directly to this email.

If you are not responsible for this package, please forward this message to the relevant personnel.



Kind regards,

Cana Cheng
UPS - China
Customer Service Center
Email: ernexportcn@ups.com
